scenario.title: Verify Provider Contracts for Individual Enrollment
scenario.step: Given user navigated to landing page
When new user logs to Internal User portal with username - internal.user.dyp+cd@gmail.com and password - Internaluser1!
When click on 'Agree' button in the Portal page
When click on Enrollment tab on header

When search for enrollment data on IU portal by next parameters:
enrollTyperequestType IndividualEnrollment
Then verify Provider Contracts in IU
